assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: AS Amber Latvijas balzams produces and sells alcoholic beverages in Latvia. The company produces approximately 100 types of alcoholic beverages. It offers sparkling and fortified wines, ciders, ready to drink (RTD) products, vodkas, liqueurs, brandy, strong alcoholic beverages, gin, etc.; and non-alcoholic drinks. The company provides its products under the Gradus, Stolichnaya, elit, Moskovskaya, Riga Black Vodka, Amber Gold Vodka, LB Vodka, 3 Graudu, Latvijas originalais, BLACK 1752, Bonaparte, Grand Cavalier, Hektors, Piparu rugtais, Riga Black Balsam, Cross Keys Gin, LB Gin, Kristofors, Moka, arlote, Riga Black Balsam Cream, Allau kimelis, Benediktins, Cosmopolitan Diva, Sparkling wine RIGA Sparkling, Rigas Prestige Cuvée, Sovetskoje, Svetskoje, Cross Key Gin coctails, Black Balsam cocktails, Moskovskaya cocktails, LB cocktails, Dins, Lucky Dog, Apple Garden, Cosmopolitan Diva non-alcoholic, and RIGAS Sparkling non-alcoholic brands. It sells its products through wholesalers, as well as retail stores. The company also exports its products to approximately 175 markets worldwide. In addition, it provides transit assurance, bonded warehouse, value added, picking, and other logistics services. The company was formerly known as AS Latvijas balzams. The company was founded in 1900 and is based in Riga, Latvia. AS Amber Latvijas balzams is a subsidiary of Amber Beverage Group Holding S.à r.l.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Intars  Geidans
